Quest.Name: Street Clear of the Beer Here

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Make sure you installed Megser's dailies quests
plugin (download the file and put in Plugins/Pandaria Dailes -Megser-): 

 https://the-azenius-projectz.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Horde%201-85/Megser's%20-The%20Golden%20Lotus-/Megser's%20-The%20Golden%20Lotus-/Pandaria%20Dailies%20-Megser-/ 

 and click continue. Otherwise make quest alone and continue.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
If you are RANGE click continue, if you are MELEE
(rogue, warrior, dk) there is probability bot wont pull these mobs from quest Ruffling Some Feathers. If that happens, you need to help him pull birds, he will kill them himself.

TurnIn.QuestName: My Town, It's on Fire Again

Objective.QuestName: Steer Clear of the Beer Here

TurnIn.QuestName: Steer Clear of the Beer Here
Mogu Within the Ruins Of Guo-Lai

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Survive in the ring for 90 seconds and click
continue (just run away from flares, thats all).

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: If quest He knows what he is doing is not completed for now please make finish it on your own and click continue.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: End of Golden Lotus Daily Quests
